heading1: Cookies on the Find a National Infrastructure Project service
paragraph1: Cookies are files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website. We use cookies to store information about how you use the Find a National Infrastructure Project service, such as the pages you visit.
paragraph2: We use different types of cookies.
paragraph3: You can choose which cookies you're happy for us to use and how the data is shared.
paragraph4: We use essential cookies to help you use the Find a National Infrastructure Project service. These do things such as:
listItem1: remember your progress through our service
listItem2: remember you have seen the cookies message
paragraph5: These cookies need to be turned on below to give you the best experience using the service.
heading4: Cookies used to improve the Find a National Infrastructure Project service
paragraph6: We use Google Analytics to measure how you use the Find a National Infrastructure Project service so we can improve it based on user needs. We do not allow Google to use or share the data about how you use this site.
paragraph7: You agree to the Planning Inspectorate using your data to help improve the Find a National Infrastructure Project service.
legend1: Do you want to accept analytics cookies?

successBanner.paragraph1: Government services may set additional cookies and, if so, will have their own cookie policy and banner.
successBanner.linkText1: Go back to the page you were looking at

errorMessage.paragraph1: We use JavaScript to set most of our cookies. Unfortunately Javascript is not running on your browser, so you cannot change your settings. You can try:
errorMessage.listItem2: turning on JavaScript in your browser
